title: MCL-VD: Multi-modal contrastive learning with LoRA-enhanced GraphCodeBERT for effective vulnerability detection
data:
Y Cao, X Ju, X Chen, L Gong\xc2\xa0- Automated Software Engineering, 2025
Vulnerability detection in software systems is a critical challenge due to the 
increasing complexity of code and the rising frequency of security vulnerabilities. 
Traditional approaches typically rely on single-modality inputs and struggle to\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\xa6
